DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To determine protein and/or RNA expression pattern capable predict tumor response therapy tumor tissue sample patient lung cancer suspect lung cancer . - To characterize gene protein find predictive response order help elucidate molecular biology underlie cancer chemosensitivity . - To evaluate DNA mutation find within lung cancer sample may predictive response resistance certain therapeutic agent . Tissue sample analyze variety technique , include DNA sequencing , RNA sequence expression level , protein assessment [ immunohistochemistry , western blot , Matrix-assisted laser desorption/ionization time flight mass spectrometry ( MALDI-MS ] ) . The goal study identify gene mutation , gene expression level , proteins predictive treatment response . Blood sample also collect obtain normal DNA analysis . After completion study , patient follow death .
